name: Rulebricks
long_description:
Many workflow builders and automation tools have support for adding logic to your processes, but get complicated quickâ€“ to the point where process owners are unable to edit them directly and require specialist services.

Rulebricks separates decision-making logic from your workflows, giving your team a clear visual, spreadsheet-like interface to manage the changing rules that drive your business, and use those rules as API endpoints, visual forms, and in automation tools like Zapier.
one_liner: Add powerful decision-making capabilities to any automated workflow.
